name: Find Home GGJ2019
description:
For our team, HOME means partnership, care, family, being together with the ones that make us feel good. Being home is something that make you feel protected and joyful.
So, our game is a puzzle in which a man and his dog are each other's home, and although there are many challenges ahead, they do not give up to get together.

Extra Credits:

Background Music: http://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music
